description:
This course is updated regularly with the latest releases of iDempiere / Adempiere and also contains interval database dumps of all the work carried out in the course.

This course has LIFETIME ACCESS once you sign up!

Implementing and learning a new ERP system can be a daunting task to say the least, even to the most skilled IT professionals and consultants. This course aims to overcome this challenge quickly and painlessly.

By going through this course you will get up to speed with Adempiere / iDeempiere and their variants, without the huge learning curve,. We start with a quick and easy intro to installing the system and then move on to the foundations of the web interface, the initial client setup and continue through to a step-by-step introduction to the iDempiere setup process.

After each module, you are invited to try the lesson for yourself to consolidate your iDempiere / Adempiere knowledge and skills.

Follow step-by-step instructions to learn how to setup and use Adempiere / iDempiere the way your business needs.

  • Over 40 lectures and 4 hours of content!
  • Clear explanations of both the how and why
  • Extensive coverage of all setup procedures an implementation would be expected to fulfill
  • Proven methodology for successful application on the job
  • Instructor available by email to respond to questions
title: Idempiere / Adempiere 101: Get up and running fast
